articles.title: NATS all the way down
articles.subtitle: ..or, how to replace your stack with one tool.
articles.leading: I've fallen in love several times these last few years since I started writing code for a living. A few highlights are Docker, Elm, functional programming, Go, simple and portable file formats, my son, markdown, gleam and now NATS. Each infatuation has taught me something important about a technology and usually also about myself.
